section.heading: Expiration of issuance authority.
section.text: The authority to issue the Bonds shall expire on March 1, 2019; provided, that the expiration of the authority shall have no effect on any Bonds issued prior to the expiration date.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 2(f) of Bryant Street Tax Increment Financing Emergency Amendment Act of 2019 (D.C. Act 23-13, Feb. 25, 2019, 66 DCR 2467).
